channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- License Metric Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- License Metric Tool

item.title: CVE-2023-43044|2023-09-28T17:23:59.611Z -- ibm -- license%20metric%20tool
item.description: IBM License Metric Tool 9.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 266893.
